data.title: The only organ that can change your life
data.meta_description: First of all, I will talk about the invisibility of the brain. Most people today value other people with their prejudices and don’t think much of the deep side of the person. There are idiots who are…
data.text:
Today I’m going to tell you about the brain, an organ that hasn’t been very popular lately.

First of all, I will talk about the invisibility of the brain. Most people today value other people with their prejudices and don’t think much of the deep side of the person.

There are idiots who are cherished just because they are handsome or beautiful, and there are people who are also expected to be stupid just because they are ugly.

Let me briefly explain what I mean. Woody Allen, pictured below, has directed 46 films, almost all of which are world-renowned, and he has written and acted in many of them at the same time. Doesn’t look like someone who’s done these things, does he?

I know someone who is 90% like him. My grandfather. I love him but he is just what he seems. Of course, there are times when prejudice is justified. That’s enough.

This invisible nature of the brain causes us to notice something we have overlooked. The answer to the…
